newsitem.title: USA: Biomet cites market penetration for gains.
newsitem.headline: Biomet cites market penetration for gains.

text.p: Biomet Inc, which designs, makes and markets products used primarily by orthopedic medical specialists, said Wednesday its higher fiscal second quarter financial results are due to continued market penetration of the company's reconstructive devices.

The company reported a profit for its fiscal second quarter ended November 30 of $26.2 million or $0.23 a share, up from $22.7 million or $0.20 in the same period a year ago. Sales increased to $144 million from $133 million a year earlier.
Biomet said its Maxim Total Knee and Alliance Hip Systems continued to capture market share in the domestic reconstructive market.
Shares of Biomet closed off 1/2 to 15-1/2.
